name: Carlsson v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Carlsson v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The issues raised by this appeal were resolved in Carlsson v. Pa. General Ins. Co., 214 Pa. Superior Ct. 479, 257 A. 2d 861 (1969).
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Jones dissents.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: David P. Truax, with him Stuart A. Culbertson, and Allen and Truax, for appellant.
Paul D. Shafer, Jr., with him Thomas,■ Shafer, Walker, Dornhaffer & Swiek, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Carlsson v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company, Appellant.
Argued March 20, 1970.
Before Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
David P. Truax, with him Stuart A. Culbertson, and Allen and Truax, for appellant.
Paul D. Shafer, Jr., with him Thomas,■ Shafer, Walker, Dornhaffer & Swiek, for appellee.
May 27, 1970:
